label: header
name: header
description: The title display above the drawing board.

label: Description
name: description
description: The description displayed above the drawing board.

label: Hide Text
name: hideText
description: Hide the Header & description above the drawing board

label: Background Color
name: backgroundColor
description: The background color of the canvas. Note: setting a background image will ignore the background color. Valid colors can be found here: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/color_value#color_keywords

label: Background Image
name: image
description: Background for the canvas. Note that the image will be scaled to fit the canvas with no regards to the aspect ratio.
